name: Bio Inc. Redemption
description: Bio Inc.: Redemption is a biomedical simulator in which you make life or death decisions. Create the ultimate illness to torment your victim or play as the head of a medical team and hopefully find a cure to save your patient.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or Better, ATI 7950 or Better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
